CustomField.formula: IF( !IsConverted && !CONTAINS(Text(Status),'Closed') ,IF(IF(Days_Since_Last_Activity__c <> 0, Days_Since_Last_Activity__c, Days_From_Creation__c) >= 9.5 ,IF(IF(Days_Since_Last_Activity__c <> 0, Days_Since_Last_Activity__c, Days_From_Creation__c) < 19.5 ,IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151M00000QWjnP", 'Orange Flag', 40, 40) ,IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151M00000QWjnK", 'Red Flag', 40, 40)) ,'') ,'')
CustomField.label: Days Since Last Activity Warning
